requirements.description: You are prohibited from passing personally identifiable information to Google, except under specific conditions related to Google Analytics features.
Any information shared with Google for Google Analytics must be hashed using industry standards to protect user privacy.
You must have and adhere to an appropriate Privacy Policy that complies with all relevant laws, policies, and regulations regarding the collection of user information.
Your Privacy Policy must inform users about your use of cookies, mobile device identifiers, or similar technologies for data collection.
You must disclose your use of Google Analytics and how it collects and processes data, potentially by linking to Google's privacy policy for partners.
You are required to provide clear and comprehensive information about, and obtain consent for, storing and accessing cookies or other information on users' devices where required by law.

type.summary: User Consent for Data Storage and Access
